tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url STRING,
    captured_date TIMESTAMP,
    location_geodata GEOMETRY,
    mining_activity_detected BOOL
)

CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP,
    location POINT,
    satellite_model VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE MiningSites (
    site_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR,
    site_location POINT,
    mining_activity BOOLEAN,
    last_activity_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IllegalMiningReports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    report_details TEXT,
    site_id UUID REFERENCES MiningSites(site_id),
    reporter_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    image_date TIMESTAMP,
    location_geodata GEOGRAPHY,
    image_metadata JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE MiningActivities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    location_geodata GEOGRAPHY,
    activity_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DetectedIllegalMining (
    detection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    activity_id UUID,
    detection_date TIMESTAMP,
    detection_accuracy FLOAT,
    detection_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DetectedAreas (
    area_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(100),
    area_geodata GEOGRAPHY,
    area_size FLOAT,
    area_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP,
    location geography,
    satellite_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE mining_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    location geography,
    satellite_id UUID,
    image_id UUID,
    CONSTRAINT fk_image FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE detected_activities (
    detection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id UUID,
    detection_date TIMESTAMP,
    detection_type VARCHAR(50),
    confidence FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_activity FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES mining_activities(activity_id)
);
